amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Air Force research, development, test and evaluation appropriation by $1 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 37 in the Congressional Record of July 31, 1995, to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for Air Force Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation by $1 billion. The intent of the amendment is to delay development of the F-22 fighter plane program for five years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 293 (Roll no. 640).
